name: context7
description: Context7 MCP Server for library documentation and code examples

resolve-library-id.description: Resolves a package/product name to a Context7-compatible library ID
resolve-library-id.returns: List of matching libraries with IDs, descriptions, and trust scores
resolve-library-id.usage: MUST be called before get-library-docs unless user provides exact library ID

get-library-docs.description: Fetches up-to-date documentation for a library
get-library-docs.returns: Documentation content for the specified library

workflow: 2. Select the most appropriate library from results
3. Call get-library-docs with the selected library ID
4. Use returned documentation to answer questions
tips: Higher token values provide more context but consume more tokens
Use topic parameter to focus on specific areas
Trust scores of 7-10 indicate more authoritative sources
Check Code Snippet counts for documentation coverage
